item.title: Boats: The Love-Hate RelationshipBoats.
item.description:
Boats: The Love-Hate Relationship

There’s the ol’ girl, reminiscing about when all systems are a go.  

Multiple stoppers can be used simultaneously for heavier tungsten weights. Multiple stoppers can be used simultaneously for heavier tungsten weights.

My 1999 Triton TR-20. The Optimax on the back of my Triton decided that she wanted to go see the doctor; that was 3 ½ weeks ago.

item.title: Boat Towing Gas Savers!
item.description:
Boat Towing Gas Savers: It’s important to keep the rig rolling down the road.  Small things I do that can help keep a couple dollars in my pocket.

You hear it all the time to check your tire pressure.  

But make Sure and Check the SPARE on both the tow and boat!!
